title: The Realization
description: His abilities to think-quick puts him steps ahead of everybody else. His skills in the martial arts puts even the best to shame. His knowledge of explosives puzzles naval officers. He is an eighteen-year-old Navy sailor who finds himself racing to beat ticking time bombs, doing unexpected helicopter jumps and trying to rescue the only girl that understands him. Is it all coincidental or is someone after William Tucker?
author: Ida Haig Janis
